name: AMOEBAD
description:
A Top-Down Shooter Where You Control Everyone! 

Complete each level by clearing the screen of enemies. Enemies only shoot when you shoot. Enemies that can move only move when you move. 

Controls: 

  • Arrow keys: move
  • Mouse: aim & shoot
  • P: back to main menu
  • M: toggle sound

Designed for GMTK Game Jam 2020 (Theme: Out of Control). All levels have been unlocked off the bat. If you get stuck, just press the 'P' key and try a different level.
